entry.title: WORKSHOP'S NOTES
entry.content:
WHAT IS RUBY ON RAILS?

Ruby on Rails (RoR) or Rails is an open source web application development framework written Ruby language which is based on Model-View-Controller(MVC),Dont Repeat Yourself(DRY) and Convention over Configuration (CoC) approch.

Well What are these ?

Lets start with MVC!

MVC is an architectural pattern which is used software engineering.

MODEL: 1. Represent the data used in practice and is part of the processing logic of the stored data. 2. To save the data in the database or get the records in the database

VIEW: 3. This part that users see

CONTROLLER: 4. Performs bring in taking action between Model and View 5. Controller sends data to the Model received from the View or sends data to the View received from the Model. 6. Basically Controller is a bridge between Model and View
